page.title: 14The Topp, Alston Moor
page.content: The building known as The Topp has been used as a kind of{community {centre}for ten years. It used to be a school and still belongs to{Cumbria {County Council.} To rent The Topp an organisation has to agree to pay a small fee and there are restrictions on who may use it. The repairs and upkeep of the building are the responsability of the County Council and a cleaner is paid by them. They also pay for the heating and lighting. The headteacher of Samuel King's School is in charge of the Topp.
